Description.Name: Tracer AC/10 Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

AC/10 Tracer Ammo (Half) Bins each contain 5 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.

Tracer AC/10 Ammo is +1 Accuracy in low light conditions at the cost of 4 damage.
